query:
SELECT id, name, reminderType, priority, day_offset, is_bundle, 
       CASE WHEN bundle_config IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_LENGTH(bundle_config) ELSE NULL END as bundle_categories
FROM reminder_templates 
WHERE is_active = 1
ORDER BY is_bundle DESC, reminderType, day_offset
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4WYXdTZ2RFuJQah.8fcf44c6f992 --database SwQCxo7pxW6R8kkqwZSJsv --execute SELECT id, name, reminderType, priority, day_offset, is_bundle, 
       CASE WHEN bundle_config IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_LENGTH(bundle_config) ELSE NULL END as bundle_categories
FROM reminder_templates 
WHERE is_active = 1
ORDER BY is_bundle DESC, reminderType, day_offset
